name: d3-dag
description: Layout algorithms for visualizing directed acylic graphs.
author: Erik Brinkman <erik.brinkman@gmail.com>

scripts.publish: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" dist/d3-dag.js -c -m -o dist/d3-dag.min.js
scripts.examples: while ! lsof -t -i:7777 > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done && ls examples/ | grep '.html$' | cut -d. -f1 | while IFS=_ read BASE DIM; do google-chrome --headless --disable-gpu --screenshot --window-size=${DIM} "http://localhost:7777/examples/${BASE}_${DIM}.html" && mv screenshot.png "examples/${BASE}.png"; done
